Player History
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 4/22/1985 with a Bruised Ribs, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1986, off Dennis Eckersley (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/6/1986, off Charlie Leibrandt (KC)...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against New York (G) on 4/20/1986...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/1986, hitting .542 with 3 HR, 13 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1986, hitting .376 with 5 HR, 24 RBI...
Injured on 5/4/1986 with a Strained Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Centerfield in 1986...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/10/1987, hitting .448 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 4/18/1987...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,300,000 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/8/1988, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/15/1988, hitting .469 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/2/1988, hitting .429 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $4,400,000 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/21/1989, hitting .435 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/28/1989, hitting .500 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1989, hitting .392 with 9 HR, 23 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Boston on 9/21/1989...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $4,400,000 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/26/1990, hitting .400 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1990, hitting .353 with 7 HR, 30 RBI...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 9/4/1990...
10/23/1990: Signed a contract extension with Texas, $7,310,000 per year, for 5 years.
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 4/10/1991...
